text: Ara amara tadera jan'ya nirdharana kare diyechilama manda sahacarasamuha, yara tadera samane o pichane ya ache ta tadera drstite sobhana kare dekhiyechila. Ara tadera upara sastira bani satya hayeche, tadera purbe cale ya'oya jina o manusera bibhinna jatira n'yaya. Niscaya tara chila ksatigrasta
